00008 // Contents: Definition of class MagnusHome
00009 //
00010 // This class replaces the use of the preprocessor symbol MAGNUS_HOME.
00011 // Main may reset the encapsulated char* when the Magnus root pathname
00012 // is specified on the command line.
00013 //
00014 // Principal Author: Roger Needham
00015 //
00016 // Status: Complete
00017 //
00018 // Revision History:
00019 //

00025 #include "config.h"
00026 
00027 #include "Chars.h"

00030 struct MagnusHome
00031 {
00032   friend int main(int argc, char* argv[]);
00033   static Chars magnusHome( ) { return Chars( magnus_home ); }
00034 
00035 private:
00036   static char* magnus_home;
00037 };
